text: Félix Zubizarreta Ezpeleta was a football player who played for Athletic Bilbao for 4 seasons, between 1913 and 1917. He scored 7 goals in Copa del Rey and won the competition 3 times in a row: 1914, 1915 and 1916. He scored also a Hat-trick in the 1916 Copa del Rey Final when Athletic won 4-0 against Madrid FC. http://www.athletic-club.eus/en/match- statistics/1_2380/1915-16_athletic-club_real-madrid-cf.html His family emigrated to Venezuela after the Spanish Civil War. His grandson Iker Zubizarreta played in the football tournament at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Spanish footballers Category:Basque footballers Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football forwards Category:Athletic Bilbao footballers Category:Spanish emigrants to Venezuela
title: Félix Zubizarreta
